snippet: Combined United States revenues for bourbon, Tennessee whiskey and rye whiskey jumped 7.8 percent to $2.9 billion in 2015.
abstract: Distilled Spirits Council reports combined United States revenues for bourbon, Tennessee whiskey and rye whiskey rose 7.8 percent to $2.9 billion in 2015, up $210 million from 2014.
lead_paragraph: Combined United States revenues for bourbon, Tennessee whiskey and rye whiskey jumped 7.8 percent to $2.9 billion in 2015.

headline.print_headline: Bourbon and Whiskey Soar at Home and Abroad
headline.main: Bourbon and Whiskey Sales Soar at Home and Abroad
